name: Skader
storyline:
Our Multiverse is collapsing, triggered by a catastrophic spacetime event. Many universes are already gone and just a handful left. Those who survived live in a constant universe incursion state and are about to collapse as well. There is an ancient rune that can protect a single universe from collapsing and the multiverse sentinels, a pure energy intelligence without body, decide to conduct a final contest the winner will take the rune home to save their universe. The sentinels pick the best warrior from each universe and invite them to the contest.

You represent one of these warriors, provided with a high-end skating device, a helmet, and a trail generator to compete. Each universe gives you unique skills (one) which distinguish you from the rest and gives advantage. The battle arena contains highly sophisticated features and power-ups. You can team up with other warriors to eliminate the rest but eventually, you will need to fight for the rune in the final 1x1 battle to decide your universe destiny.
summary: A sci-fi MOBA with unique ice-skating locomotion and a trail generator device to catch your enemies. Use power-ups to gain an advantage, coordinate with the team, and fight for your universe in a final multiverse battle for the ancient rune to save your world.
